titleStmt.title: An alarme to all Christian princes and states of the religion. Written immediatly vpon the first newes of the death of the King of Sweden of famous memory, and euer will be to all posterity, and to eternity..
titleStmt.author: Gustaf II Adolf, King of Sweden, 1594-1632.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Adolf Gustaf II. Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Imprint of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Printed marginalia, printer's ornament at colophon.
Reproduction of original in: Boston Public Library.
